channel.title: Quire & You
channel.description: A collaborative task management tool for breaking down goals in hierarchical lists.

item.title: Never leave your keyboard - Shortcuts that actually make your life easier
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: We would like to reveal some secret shortcuts keys that you might not be aware of on Quire. A full cheatsheet of our unique shortcuts.

item.title: Quire Mobile 3.0: Kanban Board comes to Mobile App
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: One of the long-awaited features that all of our users have been requesting has come to life. Today we are super excited that we have brought our famous Kanban Board to your Mobile App.

item.title: Dream Chasers: How does a Silicon Valley NPO coordinate with 400 volunteers?
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Realizing that the volunteer project’s scale and complexity have outgrown beyond a regular spreadsheet can track, ZGZG signed up for a Quire account with the hope to find a tool that helps them organize their tasks. They share with us how ZGZG uses Quire to track tasks and boost productivity across their community.

item.title: Dream Chasers: Making a Safer and Cleaner Space Environment
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Space pollution is indeed a growing problem, but may not be so obvious or visible to people on earth. Alexandre de Villardi de Montlaur and his team are among scientists and engineers trying to solve this problem. Alexandre, coordinator of the most significant project, the ECE3SAT project at ECE Paris, shares with us on how Quire has supported his team in designing a deboriting satellite that seeks to resolve this growing issue.

item.title: Import Your Data From Other Project Management Software
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Finally, the one feature that everyone is waiting for has become available in Quire. We’re introducing our new import feature in order for all of our users to restore their local backup data or migrate from other project management softwares, including Asana, Trello or Wunderlist.

item.title: Say Hello to Your New Year’s Resolutions in A Productive 2019.
item.dc:creator: Crystal Chen
item.description: We got days till Christmas. And New Year. The moment midnight strikes, people will be making their New Year’s resolutions for 2019. Whether you are starting fresh or picking up projects from where you left off in 2018—we got you covered! Brilliant project starts with brilliant ideas. And it all begins in Quire. You can easily jot down your ideas and organize them...

item.title: To Do List and Kanban: What Project Management Did Wrong
item.dc:creator: Crystal Chen
item.description: Be it teams, agencies, or companies, there must have been a time when they looked for project management tools or softwares, tried each one of them, and asked all sorts of questions about them, hoping to choose the best project management software to accomplish their next big, amazing projects. Unfortunately, there is no one-for-all, perfect solution. Just the right one to help you boost your productivity...

item.title: Quire Mark III: Nested Tasks Meets Board
item.dc:creator: Crystal Chen
item.description: Today, we are proud to announce: Quire Mark III for you to streamline your workflow visually in a board. For years, many Quire users have enjoyed “nested tasks” to see and organize their ideas into a well-planned list of small, actionable to-dos. Now, with Kanban board, execution on your to-dos is made even easier...

item.title: Quire iOS 2.0: New Features and Even Greater Performance
item.dc:creator: Crystal Chen
item.description: Quire is designed to help you realize your goals from first capturing your ideas, to turning them into minimal todos for action. Whenever, wherever you want. Today, we took Quire iOS 2.0 to another level: not only did we added new features, we also enhanced it for better consistency and better UX so you can enjoy the same experience across all devices...

item.title: Introducing: New Navigation Bar and Filter
item.dc:creator: Crystal Chen
item.description: Today, we are introducing an upgraded Quire 2.0 to better your navigation, and experience of Quire — we just cannot resist the temptation to perfect our UI/UX! In this upgrade, you will enjoy a new UI for easier, faster navigation between your project’s different views, and a whole new level filtering experience to help you focus on certain tasks...
